text_logic_form: Find the area of triangle ABC.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of triangle ABC.
diagram_logic_form: The length of line BC is 3.5 units.
The measure of angle BCA is 48 degrees.
The length of line AB is equal to the length of line AC.
line_instances: There are lines AB, AC, and BC forming triangle ABC.
Line AB is equal in length to line AC.
